id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Harmful practices are decreasing but not at a rate keeping up with population growth, which hinders achieving gender equality.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: One in five girls still marry before age 18, violating their rights and having lifelong consequences.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: 230 million girls and women have been subjected to female genital mutilation, indicating a significant gap in protecting their rights.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Far too many women still cannot realize the right to decide on their sexual and reproductive health, restricting their autonomy.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Violence against women persists, disproportionately affecting those with disabilities, highlighting the need for targeted protection.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Parity in women’s participation in public life remains elusive, with women occupying only 26.9% of seats in national parliaments.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Women carry an unfair burden of unpaid domestic and care work, spending 2.5 times more hours a day on it than men, contributing to poverty and inequality.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Strong and sustained commitments to changing biased social norms, eliminating harmful practices, and abolishing discriminatory laws are urgently needed to achieve gender equality.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: The dismantling of discriminatory laws is encouraging, but gaps persist, notably in land rights, with only 20% of countries having high levels of protection.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Legal protections of women’s land rights remain grossly inadequate, with only 9 countries having legal provisions for financial resources to strengthen women’s land ownership.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Intimate partner violence among women with disabilities is higher than those without disabilities, with limited data masking far greater risks.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Women with disabilities are underrepresented in population-based surveys on violence against women, making them 'invisible' in policies and response strategies.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Child marriage and female genital mutilation violate the rights of girls and have lifelong consequences, with an estimated 640 million girls and women married in childhood globally.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Women hold 40% of global employment but only occupy 27.5% of managerial positions, with parity in managerial roles expected to take 176 years at current rates of change.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Heavy burdens of unpaid domestic and care work trap women in poverty and inequality, limiting their labor-market participation.

id_argumento1: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
id_argumento2: Women’s empowerment in sexual and reproductive health decisions remains restricted globally, although positive strides are evident in some places, with 56% of married or in-union women able to decide on their sexual and reproductive health and rights.
